member.name: P:Obout.SuperForm.DropDownListField.DataSourceID
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the ID of the data source control that will be used as the data source for the underlying OboutDropDownList control.

member.name: P:Obout.SuperForm.DropDownListField.DataTextField
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the field of the data source that provides the text content for the list items.

member.name: P:Obout.SuperForm.DropDownListField.DataValueField
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the field of the data source that provides the value for the list items.

member.name: P:Obout.SuperForm.DropDownListField.DisplayField
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the field from the data source that will be used to display data in view mode.

member.name: P:Obout.SuperForm.FieldSet.ColumnSpan
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of field sets in the field set row that the current field set will span.

member.name: P:Obout.SuperForm.FieldSet.CssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifying the CSS class to render on the client for the field set.

member.name: P:Obout.SuperForm.FieldSet.ID
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the unique identifier of the field set.

member.name: P:Obout.SuperForm.FieldSet.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the title of the field set.

member.name: P:Obout.SuperForm.ClientSideEvents.OnAdding
member.summary: Client-side function that is executed before the add action is performed.

member.name: P:Obout.SuperForm.ClientSideEvents.OnCancelingAdd
member.summary: Client-side function that is executed when the Cancel button is clicked in Insert mode.

member.name: P:Obout.SuperForm.ClientSideEvents.OnCancelingEdit
member.summary: Client-side function that is executed when the Cancel button is clicked in Edit mode.

member.name: P:Obout.SuperForm.ClientSideEvents.OnDeleting
member.summary: Client-side function that is executed before the delete action is performed.

member.name: P:Obout.SuperForm.ClientSideEvents.OnEditing
member.summary: Client-side function that is executed before the delete edit is performed.

member.name: P:Obout.SuperForm.ClientSideEvents.OnInserting
member.summary: Client-side function that is executed before the insert action is performed.

member.name: P:Obout.SuperForm.ClientSideEvents.OnUpdating
member.summary: Client-side function that is executed before the update action is performed.
